name: Tino Sports Medicine
officers:
Ananya Anand, aanand574, President, to lead the club and to oversee all main operations
Yash Agarwal, yagarwal028, Vice President, to assist the president in duties, to check and respond to emails, to
fill in for president when needed
Anish Shamarao, ashamarao556, Secretary, to take meeting minutes at every meeting and reach out to
organizations for guest speakers
Aalok Atre, aatre502, Treasurer, to oversee any finance associated operations, to help create presentations for
Sports Med education
Rajanya Majumdar Biswas, rmajumdarbiswas620, Public Relations, to create all graphics on social media and
assist with slides
adjustment_policy: Every officer will be kind and willing to assist any position should there ever be conflict.
new_officer_application: An initial application will be filled out by applicants, then individual interviews will be conducted, and the entire current officer team will take these metrics into consideration when deciding the new officer team
